lead_paragraph: While local tennis fans bemoaned the early exits of the top two women's seeds from the Auckland Classic, organisers of next week's ATP Auckland Open delivered some good news on Thursday after world number seven David Ferrer accepted a wild card.

headline.print_headline: Ferrer Wild Card a Boost for Auckland Fans
headline.main: Ferrer Wild Card a Boost for Auckland Fans

snippet: While local tennis fans bemoaned the early exits of the top two women's seeds from the Auckland Classic, organisers of next week's ATP Auckland Open delivered some good news on Thursday after world number seven David Ferrer accepted a wild card....
